about.title: Sercan Aslan Dental Clinic
about.description:
At Sercan Aslan Dental Clinic, we combine modern dental technology with experienced specialists to provide the highest quality care:

• Advanced Techniques: From implants to veneers, we use the latest dental innovations.
• Natural Results: Smile aesthetics designed to fit your facial harmony.
• Comfort & Safety: All treatments are performed under local anesthesia in a fully equipped medical environment.
• International Service: Airport transfers, hotel accommodation, and multilingual assistance are all included.

reviews.title: Patient Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Hear from our international patients about their dental experience.

all_reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
all_reviews.review: I had my Hollywood Smile done at this clinic. The staff were amazing and the results are stunning. Highly recommend!

all_reviews.name: Martin Köhler
all_reviews.review: They organized everything perfectly – airport pickup, hotel, and appointments. My implants look and feel great!

all_reviews.name: Camille Dupont
all_reviews.review: Very professional team. The dentist explained everything clearly, and the results exceeded my expectations.

all_services.title: Dental Implants
all_services.description: Restore your smile permanently with top-quality titanium implants.

all_services.title: Hollywood Smile
all_services.description: Transform your teeth with porcelain veneers for a stunning, natural look.

all_services.title: Teeth Whitening
all_services.description: Brighten your smile safely with professional whitening treatments.

all_services.title: Zirconium Crowns
all_services.description: Durable and aesthetic crowns for a natural, long-lasting smile.

all_questions.question: How long does dental treatment take?
all_questions.answer: Most treatments are completed within 3 to 7 days, depending on the procedure.

all_questions.question: Is dental treatment painful?
all_questions.answer: All procedures are done under local anesthesia for a completely painless experience.

all_questions.question: Do you offer full smile makeover packages?
all_questions.answer: Yes, we offer Hollywood Smile, implants, and full restoration packages with hotel and transfer services.

all_questions.question: Will I need to visit again?
all_questions.answer: For major treatments like implants, a follow-up visit may be needed after 3-6 months for final crowns.
